resources.string: Enter your registered email or student ID\n & password to Sign-in.
Fill name - email - student ID - password\n & verify your email for get access
Please Sign up for the services\n of DCE buses
Please Sign in for the services\n of DCE buses
We sent a Verification code to your email. Please put the correct code to continue
By selecting your route, every day you will get update of bus location on your route. \nNote: You can change your route any time
